europeana:record.dc:title: Revision of the subtribe Pseudohelconina nov. (Hymenoptera: Braconidae)
Zoologische Mededelingen
europeana:record.dc:creator: Achterberg, van C.
europeana:record.dc:subject: Insecta
Braconidae; Helconinae
Brulleiini; Pseudohelconina; Pseudohelcon; Afrohelcon; Flavihelcon; keys; Afrotropical
europeana:record.dc:description: The strictly Afrotropical subtribe Pseudohelconina nov. is revised and illustrated. Two new genera are described: Afrohelcon gen. nov. (type-species: Afrohelcon magnificus spec. nov. from Zimbabwe) and Flavihelcon (type-species: Pseudohelcon distanti Turner, 1922 from S. Africa and Zimbabwe). Six new species are described and Pseudohelcon nigripennis Fahringer, 1941, is excluded.
europeana:record.dcterms:isPartOf: Revision of the subtribe Pseudohelconina nov. (Hymenoptera: Braconidae) (URN:ISSN:0024-0672) (Volume 63) (Issue 22)
